about_the_game:
In the dawn of the 21st century, you take on the role of a gifted explorer with a curiosity for the ancient world that knows no bounds. During an investigation of a newly discovered ruin in a dense jungle, you encounter a mysterious phenomenon that catapults you millions of years back in time, into the Dino Age. Your journey through the prehistoric age, full of dinosaurs and other creatures begins.

Stranded and unarmed amidst a prehistoric landscape teeming with dinosaurs, your survival skills are put to the ultimate test. “Can you survive the Dino Age?”

Starting from scratch, you learn to adapt to your surroundings, crafting basic tools, weapons, and shelters. As you traverse this vast new world, you uncover ancient ruins similar to the one that sent you here, pulsating with an unknown power.

These ruins, scattered across diverse landscapes, each contain unique properties that influence the local dinosaur populations and the environment. The challenges they pose and opportunities they offer are integral to mastering the Dino Age.

Your goal is to decipher the mystery of these ruins, and harness their ancient power to impact the dinosaurs and the world around you. You’ll unearth rare items, which you must use strategically for your survival and progression.
“Will you survive and thrive?”

You navigate through various biomes, each hosting unique dinosaur species. Employing stealth, combat, and even dinosaur-taming are crucial as you progress through the increasingly challenging tiers of gameplay.

Valuable loot awaits you from vanquished dinosaurs, enigmatic bosses, gathering resources, and treasure hunting – vital for crafting superior equipment, bolstering your base, and unlocking new abilities.

At its core, Dino Age is a game of exploration. The landscape is a sprawling expanse of towering forests, rugged mountains, vast plains, and hidden valleys, each teeming with life and secrets for the audacious explorer to uncover.

Dino Age is a thrilling survival and exploration game, where danger and excitement are intertwined, and your intelligence and skills are your only defenses against the prehistoric behemoths. The essence of the game is encapsulated in its taglines: “Can you survive the Dino Age?

Immerse yourself in a world of primal beauty and perilous danger. Unearth the mysteries of the past and write your own epic story of survival. Your journey starts here, in Dino Age.

During an investigation of a newly discovered ruin in a dense jungle, you encounter a mysterious phenomenon that catapults you millions of years back in time, into the Dino Age. Your journey through the prehistoric age, full of dinosaurs and other creatures begins.

Starting from scratch, you learn to adapt to your surroundings, crafting basic tools, weapons, and shelters. As you traverse this vast new world, you uncover ancient ruins similar to the one that sent you here, pulsating with an unknown power.

These ruins, scattered across diverse landscapes, each contain unique properties that influence the local dinosaur populations and the environment. The challenges they pose and opportunities they offer are integral to mastering the Dino Age.

Your goal is to decipher the mystery of these ruins, and harness their ancient power to impact the dinosaurs and the world around you. You’ll unearth rare items, which you must use strategically for your survival and progression.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra of later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Dual-Core, 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 of beter

name: Dino Age: Dinosaur Survival Game

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Dino Age: Dinosaur Survival Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 of AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti of AMD Radeon R7 360
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
